SafeVote 0.9
  • Reference

    Test the fraction of ballots required to determine a result.

    test.fraction.Rd

    Starting from some number ('astart') of randomly-selected ballots, additional randomly-selected ballots are added until the same result is obtained as when all of the ballots are counted.

    test.fraction(
  votes,
  astart = NULL,
  ainc = NULL,
  arep = NULL,
  rankMethod = "SafeRank",
  countMethod = "stv",
  countArgs = NULL
)

    Arguments

    votes

    A set of ballots

    astart

    Starting number of ballots (min 2)

    ainc

    Number of ballots to be added in each step

    arep

    Limit on the number of repetitions of the test. Required to be non-null if ainc==0.

    rankMethod

    Name of a ranking attribute in the output of countMethod

    countMethod

    The name of a function which will count the ballots

    countArgs

    List of args to be passed to countMethod (in addition to votes)

    Value

    Number of ballots required to reach the same result as when all the ballots are counted. The final ballot count is attached as an attribute "finalResults".

    Examples

    data(food_election)
test.fraction(food_election, countMethod="condorcet", 
              countArgs=list(safety=0.5))
#> Initial ranking (counting all ballots):
#>      Oranges        Pears    Chocolate Strawberries       Sweets 
#>            3            5            1            2            4 
#> 
#> Selecting an increasingly-large fraction of 20 ballots until the initial ranking is found.
#> Progress:  10%,
#> Results of Condorcet voting
#> ===========================                          
#> Number of valid votes:   2
#> Number of invalid votes: 0
#> Number of candidates:    5
#> Number of seats:         1
#> 
#> 
#> |             | Oranges| Pears| Chocolate| Strawberries| Sweets| Total| Score | BordaRank| SafeRank| Winner|
#> |:------------|-------:|-----:|---------:|------------:|------:|-----:|:-----:|---------:|--------:|------:|
#> |Oranges      |       0|     0|         0|            0|      0|     0|   0   |         4|        4|       |
#> |Pears        |       0|     0|         0|            0|      0|     0|   0   |         4|        4|       |
#> |Chocolate    |       1|     1|         0|            1|      1|     4|   8   |         1|        1|      x|
#> |Strawberries |       1|     1|         0|            0|      0|     2|   3   |         2|        2|       |
#> |Sweets       |       1|     1|         0|            0|      0|     2|   3   |         2|        2|       |
